alert.note: Alert for Meagher County Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 1:29PM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Meagher County Valleys. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST Monday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM Monday to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
